channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump says he will send troops to Portland, Oregon, in latest deployment to US cities
item.description: President Donald Trump says he will send troops to Portland, Oregon. He says he is “authorizing Full Force, if necessary” to handle what he is calling “domestic terrorists.”

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to uphold restrictions he wants to impose on birthright citizenship
Tropical weather in the Atlantic slams the Caribbean and may hit Southeast US next
